name: Lisssn
description: "Lisssn" is a point-and-click adventure game for listeners in the style of adventure classics such as "RHEM" with many puzzles and mysterious machines to set in motion. But instead of having only to look closely and to combine, this one is especially about hearing and listening closely.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Storage: 512 MB available space
